instruct.distrib: To be made available to all S1000D users.
instruct.expcont: Export of this data module to all countries that are the residence of organizations that are users of S1000D is permitted. Storage of this data module is to be at the discretion of the organization.
instruct.handling: There are no specific handling instructions for this data module.
instruct.destruct: Users may destroy this data module in accordance with their own local procedures.
instruct.disclose: There are no dissemination limitations that apply to this data module.

dsc.wireno.dscr: The wire number is the unique identifier for all electrical wires installed on the bicycle.

dsc.wiretype.dscr: Wire type identifies the electrical wire in coded form, eg AP.

dsc.wiregauge.dscr: Wire gauge identifies the gauge of the wire in coded form, eg. 010.

dsc.harnid.dscr: Harness ident identifies the harness in which the wire is pre-assembled.

dsc.length.dscr: Length identifies the length of the wire. The given value is approximately 10% higher than necessary to install the wire on the bicycle.

dsc.colour.dscr: Color identifies the color of the wire sheating.

dsc.twist.dscr: Twistig identifies wires, which are twisted together with a unique identifier.

dsc.rfd.dscr: Electric ident shows the electrical identification, to which the wire is connected. It is available for all electrical equipment, eg L1.

dsc.contact.dscr: Contact identifies the electrical contact to which the wire is connected.

dsc.screen.dscr: Screens identifies all screens that shield the wire. Wires shielded by the same screen are identified by the same screens value.

dsc.rpc.dscr: The responsible partner company indicates the company responsible for the integration of the wire to the bicycle.

dsc.harnid.dscr: Harness ident identifies pre-assembled wires, which are installed on the bicycle.

dsc.pnr.dscr: Harness part number gives the part number of the harness identified by the harness ident.

dsc.harnvar.dscr: Harness variant identifies the variant of the harness in addition to the harness part number.

dsc.harnissue.dscr: Harness issue identifies the production variant of the harness in addition to the harness part number.

dsc.rpc.dscr: The responsible partner company indicates the company responsible for the integration of the harness to the bicycle.

dsc.rfd.dscr: Electric ident shows the electrical identification, which is available for all electrical equipment, eg L1.

dsc.pnr.dscr: Part identification shows the part number of the equipment. In most cases the part number is identical to the part desciption.

dsc.instloc.dscr: Location shows the installation position of the equipment on the bicycle.

dsc.rpc.dscr: The responsible partner company indicates the company responsible for the integration of the equipment to the bicycle.
